name: mcp-obs
description: MCPlatform - Observability and management platform for MCP servers

scripts.build: bun run build:packages && cd packages/dashboard && bun run build
scripts.build:packages: cd packages/database && bun run build && cd ../server-sdk && bun run build && cd ../client-sdk && bun run build
scripts.type-check: cd packages/database && bun run type-check && cd ../server-sdk && bun run type-check && cd ../client-sdk && bun run type-check && cd ../dashboard && bun run type-check
scripts.clean: bun run clean:packages && cd packages/dashboard && bun run clean
